title: Adopt Prisma ORM for core services
context: We need a consistent data access layer for new services. Current SQL usage is ad hoc and varies per team.
motivation: Improve developer velocity and reduce query bugs while maintaining performance.

alternatives_considered.name: Continue with raw SQL
alternatives_considered.why_not: Inconsistent patterns and duplicated boilerplate slow delivery and increase defects.

alternatives_considered.name: Adopt TypeORM
alternatives_considered.why_not: Lacks the schema migration workflow we need and has inconsistent TypeScript ergonomics.

assumptions: Team is comfortable with generated clients
